Package org.cloudifysource.esc.util

Copyright (c) 2012 GigaSpaces Technologies Ltd.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
CalcUtils A utility class for calculations.
FileUtils A utility class for file system handling.
GridCommandLineBuilder Service grid system properties utils class.
IPUtils A utility class for IP manipulation and validation.
JCloudsUtils JClouds related utilities.
LoggerOutputStream An output stream implementation that sends all output to a JUL logger.
ShellCommandBuilder A simple wrapper around a StringBuilder.
SSHExec This is a copy of the SSHExec class from Ant, with a few minor modifications required for Cloudify.
StringUtils A utility class for string manipulation.
Utils Utilities class.
 

Enum Summary
ShellCommandBuilder.ScriptLanguages Enum for supported script languages.
